publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2255 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designations of Lead Committee-That the Parliament agrees the following designations of Lead Committee- The Justice 1 Committee to consider the Criminal Legal Aid (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2001 (SSI 2001/306); The Justice 1 Committee to consider the Criminal Legal Aid (Fixed Payments) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2001 (SSI 2001/307); The Justice 1 Committee to consider the Parole Board (Scotland) Rules 2001 (SSI 2001/315); The Local Government Committee to consider the Firemen's Pension Scheme (Pension Sharing on Divorce) (Scotland) Order 2001 (SSI 2001/310). Supported by: Euan Robson*
